scripts.ignore:build:1: sh -c 'find ./dist/index.js -type f -exec sed -i -E "s/function _interopRequire/\/* istanbul ignore next *\/\nfunction _interopRequire/g" {} \;'
scripts.ignore:build:2: sh -c 'find ./dist/index.js -type f -exec sed -i -E "s/^(.*arguments\[1\] === undefined)/\/* istanbul ignore next *\/\n\1/g" {} \;'
scripts.ignore:build: npm run ignore:build:1 && npm run ignore:build:2
scripts.ignore:test: sh -c 'find ./dist/test.js -type f -exec sed -i "s/function _interopRequire/\/* istanbul ignore next *\/\nfunction _interopRequire/g" {} \;'
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run babel && npm run bundle && npm run ignore:build && npm run minify && npm run gzip
